trans-unit.source: Provides information about an imaging codec.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre um codec de geração de imagens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo> can be obtain for each codec in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo> é possível obter a cada codec em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> propriedade de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the author of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o criador do codec.

trans-unit.source: The author of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O autor do codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> propriedade de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.source: Callers must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> registry permission to retrieve data from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the container format for the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o formato de contêiner do codec.

trans-unit.source: The container format of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O formato de contêiner do codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> propriedade de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the same approach to retrieve other <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a mesma abordagem para recuperar outros <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Callers must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> registry permission to retrieve data from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the device manufacturer of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o fabricante do dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: The device manufacturer of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O fabricante do dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the device models of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica os modelos de dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: The device model of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O modelo do dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the file extensions associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica as extensões de arquivo associadas ao codec.

trans-unit.source: The file extensions associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: As extensões de arquivo associadas com o codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the friendly name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o nome amigável do codec.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O nome amigável do codec.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.

trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associado ao codec.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] types associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] tipos associados com o codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the specification version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica a versão de especificação do codec.

trans-unit.source: The specification version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: A versão de especificação do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports animation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o codec dá suporte a animação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the codec supports animation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o codec dá suporte a animação; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Callers must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> registry permission to retrieve data from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports lossless of images.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o codec dá suporte sem perda de imagens.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the codec supports lossless of images; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o codec suporta sem perda de imagens; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Callers must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> registry permission to retrieve data from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies whether the codec supports multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica se o codec dá suporte a vários quadros.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the codec supports multiple frames; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o codec dá suporte a várias estruturas; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Callers must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> registry permission to retrieve data from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem ter <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> permissão de registro para recuperar dados do registro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica a versão do codec.

trans-unit.source: The version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: A versão do codec.
